tasks.question: Research the concept of arrow functions in JavaScript ?
tasks.hints: Consider how arrow functions handle the this keyword compared to regular functions

tasks.question: Explore the concept of modules in JavaScript and how they help organize code ?
tasks.hints: Consider how modules improve code maintainability and encourage encapsulation
